title: Enchanted Forest Wedding Cake
description: A multi-tiered wedding cake featuring intricate sugar flowers and woodland creature details. Flavors included lemon raspberry and double chocolate.

title: Superhero Birthday Bash Cake
description: A vibrant and action-packed cake for a child's birthday, showcasing their favorite superheroes in edible form.

title: Corporate Anniversary Logo Cake
description: A sleek and professional cake designed with the company's logo for their 10th anniversary celebration.
